pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, September 15, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Bloor West Village Toronto Ukrainian Festival.

Main Stage, Bloor Street West and Jane Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the entrance of 2425 Bloor Street West no later than 11:30 a.m.

1:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Roncesvalles Polish Festival.

Main Stage, Roncesvalles Avenue and Wright Avenue

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves behind the Main Stage at Roncesvalles Avenue and Wright Avenue no later than 1:20 p.m.
